data.title: Ocean's Eleven
data.meta_description: A group of criminals come together to pull off a heist against three Las Vegas casinos. This remake of the 1960 film features strong language and sex references that may be unsuitable for younger viewers.
data.text:
violence

There is some mild violence, including brief sight of a shooting, without blood or strong detail, and sight of people being tackled and punched, again without blood or detail.

threat and horror

The robbery scenes are tense and a person fakes a heart attack as a distraction.

language

There is infrequent use of strong language ('f**k'), as well as milder terms including 'shit'.

sex

There is sight of scantily clad dancers and in one scene a character performs a provocative dance for a security guard in order to steal his ID. There is no full nudity in these scenes. There are also some mild verbal sex references, as well as sight of cards advertising the services of escorts.

nudity

Nudity is implied when cards are seen advertising escorts. No clear nudity is shown, although a woman is seen covering her breasts with her hands.

alcohol and smoking

Adult characters drink alcohol.

language

There is infrequent strong language ('f**k').

sex

Moderate sex references include the discovery of a bag filled with what are described as 'fliers for hookers', featuring images of a woman covering her bare breasts with her hands.

There are some scenes of mild violence in which men trade punches with one another.
